guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager\\").instanceCount-1;\\nvar meetingType\,disputeID;\\nvar disList = guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances\\");\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n meetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n disputeID = disList[i].table1_item1.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\nvar HostPath=window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port;\\nvar jsonData = {\\n \\"ea\\" : ea.value\,\\n \\"district\\" : district.value\,\\n \\"DisputeID\\" : disputeID\,\\n \\"MeetingType\\" : meetingType\,\\n \\"DRType\\" : SelectDRADRB.value\,\\n \\"AddInfoDate\\" : ReqAddInfoDateRecChair.value\,\\n \\"AddInfoResChec\\" : ReqAddInfoResChk.value\,\\n \\"AddInfoConChec\\" : ReqAddInfoConChk.value\,\\n \\"AddInfoDesc\\" : ReqAddInfoDescRecChair.value\,\\n \\"RecomType\\" : \\"Partial\\"\,\\n \\"userRole\\" : userRole.value.toUpperCase()\,\\n \\"userID\\" : userID.value\,\\n \\"HostPath\\" : HostPath\\n};\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRB\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRB.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRB.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRB.value\\n };\\n}\\nelse if(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRA\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRA.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRA.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRA.value\\n };\\n}\\nvar PCRArray=[];\\nvar PCRList = PCPRecChair.Row1RecChair.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < PCPRecChair.Row1RecChair.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n if(i!==0){\\n \\tvar eachPCR={};\\n eachPCR.PCRNo = PCRList[i].tableItem11.value;\\n eachPCR.Description = PCRList[i].tableItem12.value;\\n \\tif(PCRList[i].tableItem13.value !== null){\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=PCRList[i].tableItem13.value.toString().substring(2);\\n }\\n else{\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=\\"\\";\\n }\\n eachPCR.DelayDays=PCRList[i].tableItem14.value;\\n eachPCR.SupplementalDate=PCRList[i].tableItem15.value;\\n eachPCR.DateREResponseTOSPCR=PCRList[i].tableItem16.value;\\n eachPCR.DateRefer=PCRList[i].tableItem17.value;\\n PCRArray.push(eachPCR);\\n }\\n}\\njsonData.DisputeDetails=PCRArray;\\nvar meetDate=new Date(MeetDateRecChair.value.replace('

'\,'').replace('

'\,''));\\njsonData.ProjectInfo.meetDate=setMon(meetDate.getMonth())+\\"/\\"+meetDate.getDate()+\\"/\\"+meetDate.getFullYear();\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\njsonData.templateName=\\"ADR001.xdp\\";\\njsonData.DisputeID=DisputeMeetIDHide.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoDueDate=ReqAddInfoDateRecChair.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoConCK=ReqAddInfoConChk.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoRECK=ReqAddInfoResChk.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoReqInput=ReqAddInfoDescRecChair.value;\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n//console.log(xmlData);\\nurl = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/async_invoke/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/InsertRecommendationRecord';\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n ReqAddSucMssgeRecChair.visible=true;\\n ReqAddSucMssgeRecChair.value=\\"

Details requested successfully

\\";\\n ReqAddErrorMssgeRecChair.visible=false;\\n ReqAddInfoSecRecChair.enabled=false;\\n this.enabled=false;\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){ \\n ReqAddErrorMssgeRecChair.visible=true;\\n ReqAddErrorMssgeRecChair.value=\\"

Something went wrong

\\";\\n ReqAddSucMssgeRecChair.visible=false;\\n ReqAddInfoSecRecChair.enabled=true;\\n this.enabled=true;\\n }\\n});\\n}\\nelse{\\n ReqAddErrorMssgeRecChair.visible=true;\\n ReqAddErrorMssgeRecChair.value=\\"

Please enter additional description and click on submit button

\\";\\n ReqAddSucMssgeRecChair.visible=false;\\n}\\nfunction setMon(month){\\n if(month<9){\\n return \\"0\\"+(month+1);\\n }\\n else{\\n return month+1;\\n }\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel-re.ReqAddInfoSecRecChair.button_1269450121656314861672"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

meetingPanelValidate=MeetingDRAPanel.validate();\\n}\\nif(BriefDescRecChair.value!==null && BriefDescRecChair.value!==\\"\\" && RecomInputRecChair.value!==null && RecomInputRecChair.value!==\\"\\" && DRBFavRecChair.value!==null && DRBFavRecChair.value!==\\"\\" && String(meetingPanelValidate)===\\"true\\"){\\nthis.enabled=false;\\nvar jsonData={};\\n//check and add attenes into the json\\nvar AttendListArr=[];\\n var Attendist = MeetAtendPanelRecChair.instanceManager.instances;\\n for(var i=0;i < MeetAtendPanelRecChair.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n var checkbool = Attendist[i].AttendNameRecChair.value!==null || Attendist[i].AttendJobTitleRecChair.value!==null || Attendist[i].AttendCheckRecChair.value!==null;\\n if(checkbool){\\n var eachAttend={};\\n eachAttend.name=Attendist[i].AttendNameRecChair.value;\\n eachAttend.jobtitle=Attendist[i].AttendJobTitleRecChair.value;\\n eachAttend.attendType=Attendist[i].AttendCheckRecChair.value;\\n AttendListArr.push(eachAttend);\\n }\\n }\\njsonData.AttendDetails=AttendListArr;\\nvar disputeArray=[];\\njsonData.templateName=\\"ADR001.xdp\\";\\njsonData.RecomType=\\"Complete\\";\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRB\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRB.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRB.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRB.value\\n };\\n}\\nelse if(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRA\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": PCPRecChair.Row1RecChair.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < PCPRecChair.Row1RecChair.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n if(i!==0){\\n \\tvar eachPCR={};\\n eachPCR.PCRNo = PCRList[i].tableItem11.value;\\n eachPCR.Description = PCRList[i].tableItem12.value;\\n if(PCRList[i].tableItem13.value !== null){\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=PCRList[i].tableItem13.value.toString().substring(2);\\n }\\n else{\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=\\"\\";\\n }\\n eachPCR.DelayDays=PCRList[i].tableItem14.value;\\n eachPCR.SupplementalDate=PCRList[i].tableItem15.value;\\n eachPCR.DateREResponseTOSPCR=PCRList[i].tableItem16.value;\\n eachPCR.DateRefer=PCRList[i].tableItem17.value;\\n PCRArray.push(eachPCR);\\n }\\n}\\njsonData.DisputeDetails=PCRArray;\\njsonData.FilePaths=FilePathsRecomChair.value;\\njsonData.DisputeID=DisputeMeetIDHide.value;\\njsonData.briefDesc=BriefDescRecChair.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoDueDate=ReqAddInfoDateRecChair.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoConCK=ReqAddInfoConChk.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoRECK=ReqAddInfoResChk.value;\\njsonData.AddInfoReqInput=ReqAddInfoDescRecChair.value;\\njsonData.recommenInput=RecomInputRecChair.value;\\njsonData.Favor=DRBFavRecChair.value;\\n//jsonData.signName=SignNameMainRecChair.value;\\n//jsonData.signDate=SignDateRecChair.value;\\njsonData.DRType=SelectDRADRB.value;\\njsonData.userRole=userRole.value;\\njsonData.ea=ea.value;\\njsonData.district=district.value;\\njsonData.userID=userID.value;\\njsonData.role=userRole.value.toUpperCase();\\njsonData.HostPath=window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port;\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value === \\"DRB\\"){\\n jsonData.meetingCalled = MeetCallRecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.MeetInfoChair = DRBChairRecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.MeetInfoMeetingDate = MeetingDateRecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.MeetDRBMember1 = DRBMemr1RecomDRB.value;\\n //jsonData.MeetDRBMember2 = DRBMemr2RecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.MeetLocation = MeetLOCRecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.CaltransRep = CalRepRecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.MeetAtt1 = attendee1RecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.ContractorRep = ContractoRepRecomDRB.value;\\n jsonData.MeetAtt2 = attendee2RecomDRB.value;\\n}\\nelse if(SelectDRADRB.value === \\"DRA\\"){\\n jsonData.meetingCalled = MeetCallRecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.MeetInfoMeetingDate = MeetingDateRecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.MeetLocation = MeetLOCRecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.MeetDRAName = AdvisorRecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.CaltransRep = CalRepRecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.MeetAtt1 = attendee1RecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.ContractorRep = ContractoRepRecomDRA.value;\\n jsonData.MeetAtt2 = attendee2RecomDRA.value;\\n} \\nvar count = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;\\nvar disList = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n jsonData.MeetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n//console.log(xmlData);\\nurl = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/async_invoke/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/InsertRecommendationRecord';\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data);\\n SucMssgeRecChair.visible=true;\\n ErrorMssgeRecChair.visible=false;\\n SucMssgeRecChair.value=\\"

Data submitted successfully\, please check your mail

something went wrong

\\";\\n PreviewRecChair.visible=false;\\n this.enabled=true;\\n }\\n});\\n}\\nelse{\\n ErrorMssgeRecChair.visible=true;\\n SucMssgeRecChair.visible=false;\\n ErrorMssgeRecChair.value=\\"

Please enter required details

\\";\\n}\\nfunction setMon(month){\\n if(month<9){\\n return \\"0\\"+(month+1);\\n }\\n else{\\n return month+1;\\n }\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel-re.SubmitRecomButton"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) { \\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"ReqRecAttach1RecomChairReqRecAttach1RecomChair\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"ReqRecAttach1RecomChair\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n //console.log(docs);\\n FilePathsRecomChair.value=docs;\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel-re.RequestReconsiderPanelRecChair.ReqRecAttach1RecomChair"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
